title: Lost Boys Interactive (2022 - 2024)
description: In my role at LBI, I worked on the pre-production to ship phases for WWE 2K23, specifically in the MyFaction game mode. I am also working on an unannounced AAA PC and Console game.

title: PerBlue Entertainment (2019 - 2022)
description: At PerBlue, I worked on UI/UX for their flagship title, Disney Heroes: Battle Mode. I also worked on their most recent title, Twisted Towers, as the primary Gameplay Engineer.

title: Roboxing (2019)
description: Roboxing was a project developed for a physical arcade cabinet outside of the Husky Game Development lab. It also has a release on my itch.io (https://tyler-eichten.itch.io/)

title: Barnout (2018)
description: Barnout is a 2-4 player party game I developed as a sophomore with a team for the Husky Game Development enterprise at Michigan Tech. I developed the front end and UX code in Unity as well as the art and graphics. Available at https://huskygames.com/games/?game=barnout

title: Siege of Arrolith (2017)
description: Siege of Arrolith is a 2-4 player turn based combat game I developed as a freshmen with a team for the Husky Game Development enterprise at Michigan Tech. I developed the front end and UX code in Java. Available at https://huskygames.com/games/?game=siege-of-arrolith
